document.discussion_title: Authorities: Catskill man arrested for owning multiple illegal weapons
document.topic_text: Authorities: Catskill man arrested for owning multiple illegal weapons Web Staff Published: Click to share on Pinterest (Opens in new window) CATSKILL, N.Y. (NEWS10) – Police say a Catskill man was arrested after possessing numerous illegal weapons in his home. State Police say 38-year-old Shawn Butterworth was taken into custody after police say a domestic incident happened at his house. He was charged with Unlawful Imprisonment 2nd, a class E Felony, Criminal Possession of a Weapon 2 nd , a class C Felony, 5 counts of Criminal Possession of a Weapon 3rd, a class D Felony and 6 counts of Criminal Possession of a Weapon 4 th , a class A Misdemeanor. Butterworth was arraigned in the Town of Catskill Court and was remanded to the Greene County Jail on $25,000 cash bail $50,000 bond bail.
